prompts: What are 6 things that you are grateful for today?
What helps you slow down and feel more present?
Whats a goal you want to accomplish today and why?
What things in my life make me smile? How can I incorporate them into my life more?
What things do I want to focus on today outside of school?
When was the last time you really laughed? What did you laugh about?
What is one thing I can commit to today that my future self will thank me for?
